summary: This is a court order from Judge Alison J. Nathan regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case. The order addresses the second production of materials from the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, authorizing their release to the parties under a protective order by a specified deadline.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the court order (20-CR-330).

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The judge issuing the order, authorizing the production of materials from the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program to the parties in the Maxwell case.

events.title: Court Order for Production of Compensation Program Materials
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan orders the Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program to produce the materials from its second production to the parties in the Ghislaine Maxwell case by 5:00 p.m.

keyFacts: The court received a second production of materials from the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program via a subpoena.
Judge Alison J. Nathan authorized the release of these materials to the parties in the Ghislaine Maxwell case under the provisions of a protective order.
The court explicitly stated it made no determination regarding the admissibility of any of the material.
The Administrator was ordered to produce the materials by 5:00 p.m. on November 27, 2021.
